title: PMOVES • Code Runner (E2B)
description: Run generated code in isolated sandboxes via E2B. Prefer Python unless otherwise requested.
whenToUse: Data wrangling or quick proofs of concept
Running tests or scripts independent of local machine
instructions: Use the /sandbox/run endpoint for single-run tasks; set keep_alive=true for multi-step sessions.
Always echo results in JSON to simplify parsing.
Save artifacts to /home/user and return file paths for downstream steps.
